body.p:
Hd Qrs 11" Ky Cav
Allatoona Geo
June 7" 1864.
Gov Bramlette
Sir

I have the honor to recommend to you for promotion Sergt A. W. Stone Company "B" 11th Ky Cav to be commissioned as 2nd Lt same Company ^June 268, 1864^ vice G. Q. Burgess resigned, this promotion gallant and meritorious conduct during his time of service.

I am very Resptly
Your Obt Servt
A. J. Alexander
Lt Col Cmdg 11th Ky Cav

Hd qrs 11th Ky Cavl
Allatoona Ga
June 7th 1864

11 Cavy
Alexander A. J
Lt Col Comd
Recommends for prot sergt A W Stone co "B" to be 2 Lt same co vice Burgess resigned
Issue
Boyle

Com issd & forwd
June 28. 1864
Recd A G O. 27 June 1864
